articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Get Ready! The 'Blood Moon' Total Lunar Eclipse Is About to Happen - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Stargazers will have a chance to see a "Blood Moon" on Sunday night during a total lunar eclipse visible across Asia and swathes of Europe and Africa.
articles.content:
Stargazers will have a chance to see a " Blood Moon" on Sunday night during a total lunar eclipse visible across Asia and swathes of Europe and Africa.
